name: Telephony
description: Sector template for telephony patents including VoIP, call signaling, and unified communications.
contextDescription: Telephony patents cover voice communication systems. Key areas include VoIP (SIP, RTP), call signaling, IMS, and unified communications. High-value targets include Cisco (WebEx), Microsoft (Teams), Zoom, RingCentral, and telco IMS deployments. UCaaS is a growing cloud market.
scoringGuidance: VoIP patents target enterprise and consumer calling.
SIP/IMS patents are relevant to telco infrastructure.
Call quality (jitter, echo) patents improve user experience.
UC patents target Microsoft Teams, Cisco WebEx, Zoom.
